title: Fly High Tulisan Jawi Contest (1) : Type @ Win
content:
Dear Friends,  
The first to post error-free text out of J1+J2.Pdf will be rewarded with one copy of our Arabic/Jawi Kaligrafer.  
 [http://www.maryamsoft.com/QalamBartar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420002836/http:/www.maryamsoft.com/QalamBartar "http://www.maryamsoft.com/QalamBartar")  
 [http://bagaimanalagi.com/?cat=14](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420002836/http:/bagaimanalagi.com/?cat=14 "http://bagaimanalagi.com/?cat=14")  
Deadline: 2014.08.20  
All the Best for All

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [J1.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420002836/http:/typophile.com/files/J1.pdf) | 1.38 MB |
| [J2.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420002836/http:/typophile.com/files/J2.pdf) | 1.09 MB |
author: AzizMostafa

comments.content:
I want to be rewarded but I think this will not be an easy task. No one can really guarantee 100% error free.

- [rave pants](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420002836/http:/modotblog.com/)

Just for/from (markdanderson), a text with not more than ten (10) errors will be accepted if posted here before or on 2014.09.01. Or [http://typophile.com/node/119072](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420002836/http:/typophile.com/node/119072 "http://typophile.com/node/119072")

First and foremost You got an extraordinary site. I will be intrigued by more comparable themes. i see you got truly exceptionally helpful subjects , i will be continually checking your web journal much appreciated.

I anticipate all the more great articles and I think we all like to thank such a variety of great articles, site to impart to us.

[www.flymesocial.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420002836/http:/www.flymesocial.com/ "www.flymesocial.com")

What is being said by the above commentators, is being completely agreed. I was one of the person who was rewared and I used some exclusive techniques mentioned on [here Likesbazar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420002836/http:/www.likesbazar.com/social-media-careers/tips-to-become-a-social-media-professional/) I'll keep trying harder next time. :)
